name: River Oak Cabinetry
overview:
River Oak Cabinetry & Design offers design expertise and a selection of cabinetry that has been carefully selected to represent the best value in a variety of price ranges.

Our showroom is conveniently located to accommodate the needs of residents in Naperville, Plainfield, Oswego, Aurora, Bolingbrook and other nearby communities. We are a little bit hidden, but well worth the trip!

We are a small, family-owned business that is committed to quality, integrity and dependability, and we believe our carefully researched cabinet companies give the best value in every price category from entry-level to the most deluxe products available.

We provide personalized and attentive service focused on listening carefully to our clientsâ€™ needs and desires. We strive to create a pleasant, positive experience for each client, as together we create a beautiful and practical kitchen, bath, home office or entertainment center.

River Oak Cabinetry & Design is also distinctive for offering the product quality and professional design experience of a high-end boutique showroom yet with prices that compare with those of large home centers. Our design staff has a combined 20 years of experience, and we are committed to giving clients personalized service and project management based on honest communication and responsive attention to every detail.

River Oak Cabinetry & Design also can provide expert installation services. The head installer has more than 30 years of experience. In addition, River Oak Cabinetry & Design has partnerships with other local businesses and can provide resources for all aspects of remodeling projects, including flooring, countertops, lighting, tile backsplashes and other elements.
